updates.title: Website designed and launched!
updates.summary: Say hello to an easier way to find everything about the server!
changes: i've finally designed and launched the website for the server!! i'm really proud of how it turned out and I'm hoping this provides.. some use.. later on.

updates.title: Server has been started (alongside bedrock support!)
updates.summary: Say hello to the server! We are in action
changes: Bedrock support at bed.cbhs.online (read cbhs.online/bedrock for more support)..
Added TPA and /home, with a limit of 6 homes!

updates.title: Nether Update
updates.summary: The nether has been opened, feel free to raid bastions and stuff for better items!
changes: Nether has been opened, you are free to create as many farms as you need!

updates.title: Patching and fixing..
changes: TPA has been temporarily disabled because of some abuse described by the command.
Fixed glitches that pertained to the nether roof so that you may be able to build gold farms as you need!
Read rules for our rules about chests and griefing!
New plugins that'll help us detect and pertain to cheating and griefing easier.
